title: THINGS ARE TOUGH ALL OVER
plot_des: Cheech and Chong are hired to drive a limo from Chicago to Las Vegas by two shady Arabs - Mr. Slyman (Cheech) and Prince Habib (Chong). Unbeknownst to them, five million dollars of dirty money has been stuffed throughout the car.

title: FIRST BLOOD
plot_des: A veteran Green Beret is forced by a cruel Sheriff and his deputies to flee into the mountains and wage an escalating one-man war against his pursuers.

title: HONKYTONK MAN
plot_des: A boy with a music talent goes on a journey with his uncle for a stage concert.

title: FIREFOX
plot_des: A pilot is sent into the Soviet Union on a mission to steal a prototype jet fighter that can be partially controlled by a neuralink.

title: PINK FLOYD THE WALL
plot_des: A confined but troubled rock star descends into madness in the midst of his physical and social isolation from everyone.

title: PARTNERS
plot_des: A heterosexual police detective is unnerved when ordered to go undercover with a homosexual police clerk, as a couple, to solve a series of murders in the gay community.

title: IT CAME FROM HOLLYWOOD
plot_des: Popular comedians watch and give comments about the worst and silliest films from Hollywood.

title: TRON
plot_des: A computer hacker is abducted into the digital world and forced to participate in gladiatorial games where his only chance of escape is with the help of a heroic security program.

title: THE YEAR OF LIVING DANGEROUSLY
plot_des: A young Australian reporter tries to navigate the political turmoil of Indonesia during the rule of President Sukarno with the help of a diminutive photographer.

title: TIME BANDITS
plot_des: A young boy accidentally joins a band of time travelling dwarves, as they jump from era to era looking for treasure to steal.

title: CHARIOTS OF FIRE
plot_des: Two British track athletes, one a determined Jew, and the other a devout Christian, compete in the 1924 Olympics.

title: ARTHUR
plot_des: Alcoholic billionaire playboy Arthur Bach must marry a woman he does not love, or he will be cut off from his $750,000,000 fortune. But when Arthur falls in love with a poor waitress, he must decide if he wants to choose love or money.

title: ABSENCE OF MALICE
plot_des: When a prosecutor leaks a false story that a liquor warehouse owner is involved in the murder of a union head, the man's life begins to unravel.

title: ESCAPE FROM NEW YORK
plot_des: In 1997, when the U.S. president crashes into Manhattan, now a giant maximum security prison, a convicted bank robber is sent in to rescue him.

title: CLASH OF THE TITANS
plot_des: Perseus must battle Medusa and the Kraken to save the Princess Andromeda.

title: NIGHTHAWKS
plot_des: When one of Europe's most lethal terrorists shows up in New York, an elite undercover cop is assigned to take him down by any means necessary.

title: PRINCE OF THE CITY
plot_des: A New York City narcotics detective reluctantly agrees to cooperate with a special commission investigating police corruption, and soon realises he's in over his head, and nobody can be trusted.

title: ONE FROM THE HEART
plot_des: A couple has a fight after living together 5 years in Las Vegas. They go out and celebrate 4th of July, each with a new partner. Breakup?

title: WHOSE LIFE IS IT ANYWAY
plot_des: Richard Dreyfuss stars in this black comedy as a sculptor who becomesparalyzed after an auto accident and fights the hospital administrationfor the right to die.

title: FRIDAY THE 13TH
plot_des: A group of camp counselors are stalked and murdered by an unknown assailant while trying to reopen a summer camp which was the site of a child's drowning and a grisly double murder years before.

title: THE STUNT MAN
plot_des: A fugitive stumbles on a movie set just when they need a new stunt man, takes the job as a way to hide out and falls for the leading lady.

title: THE BLUE LAGOON
plot_des: In the Victorian period, two children are shipwrecked on a tropical island in the South Pacific. With no adults to guide them, the two make a simple life together, unaware that sexual maturity will eventually intervene.

title: THE GODS MUST BE CRAZY
plot_des: A comic allegory about a traveling Bushman who encounters modern civilization and its stranger aspects, including a clumsy scientist and a band of revolutionaries.

title: THE ELEPHANT MAN
plot_des: A Victorian surgeon rescues a heavily disfigured man who is mistreated while scraping a living as a side-show freak. Behind his monstrous façade, there is revealed a person of kindness, intelligence and sophistication.

title: TRIBUTE
plot_des: A shallow Broadway press agent learns he is dying just as his son by his ex-wife arrives for a visit.

title: HEAVENS GATE
plot_des: During the Johnson County War in 1890 Wyoming, a sheriff born into wealth does his best to protect immigrant farmers from rich cattle interests.

title: SATURN 3
plot_des: Two lovers stationed at a remote base in the asteroid fields of Saturn are intruded upon by a retentive technocrat from Earth and his charge: a malevolent eight foot robot.

title: CRUISING
plot_des: A police detective goes undercover in the underground S&M gay subculture of New York City to catch a serial killer who is preying on gay men.
